name: Samuel Micah Wlodawski
title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience designing and delivering React.js and Svelte front-end applications integrated with Python (Django, Flask) and Node.js backend. Skilled in MERN/MEAN stack development, AI/ML-powered solutions, and cloud-native architectures. Proven track record in building scalable systems, integrating machine learning models, developing RESTful and GraphQL APIs, and deploying enterprise-grade solutions on AWS and Azure. Strong background in consulting, client delivery, and technical leadership.

experience.title: Senior Software Developer
details: Engineered React front-end applications integrated with Python (Django, Flask) and Node.js backends for AI-driven interactive solutions.
Integrated AI/ML models using Python, TensorFlow, and Scikit-learn for real-time analytics and predictive modeling.
Architected RESTful and GraphQL APIs to support large-scale, data-intensive applications.
Deployed cloud infrastructure on AWS (EC2, Lambda, S3, SageMaker) using automated CI/CD pipelines.
Applied TDD practices with Jest and PyTest to maintain high code quality.
Optimized front-end performance using modular components, lazy loading, and virtualized rendering.
Mentored junior engineers on Angular best practices and full-stack integration strategies.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
details: Designed React dashboards and Angular components for healthcare and research analytics platforms.
Applied predictive analytics and NLP pipelines for patient outcomes using Python (Django, Flask), TensorFlow and Scikit-learn.
Built RESTful and GraphQL APIs for secure multi-client research workflows.
Orchestrated ETL pipelines using Pandas and Apache Airflow for high-volume datasets.
Streamlined CI/CD deployments via GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps.
Led code reviews and mentorship to ensure scalable architecture.

experience.title: Software Engineer
details: Developed enterprise dashboards using React with Python (Django, Flask) and Node.js backends.
Built event-driven microservices in Python and Node.js for distributed applications.
Deployed cloud-native solutions leveraging AWS (Lambda, S3, DynamoDB, EC2) with Infrastructure-as-Code.
Implemented unit and integration testing with Jest and PyTest to promote TDD practices.
Enhanced front-end performance with modular components, virtualized rendering, and lazy loading.
Coordinated with remote teams to align technical delivery with product requirements and sprint goals.
Built secure APIs and data pipelines for internal and client-facing enterprise applications.

experience.title: Junior Web Developer
details: Developed interactive dashboards using Angular and React.js for supply chain and logistics tracking.
Designed and maintained REST APIs with Node.js and Express.js; integrated MySQL and MongoDB databases.
Led cloud migration initiatives, moving on-premises applications to AWS EC2 and S3.
Contributed to internal ERP module development, enhancing order tracking, shipping, and inventory control.
Established unit testing frameworks with Jest and Mocha to automate QA workflows.
Participated in Agile Scrum ceremonies, sprint planning, and backlog refinement.
Built real-time reporting dashboards, reducing manual spreadsheet workflows.
